= modifying settings =

== change path in filedirectory ==

As no files in the system are absolute, one can change the internal path without having to change any settings.

== change path in URI ==

If you want to move the site root from one path to another on the server, you will have to change the base path defined in the [webFilestructure#.htaccess .htaccess] file.
{{{
http://example.com/
}}}

to

{{{
http://example.com/sub/
}}}
